name: SNK vs Capcom 2 - RIVALS
description:
Released in 2015, SNK vs Capcom 2 - RIVALS is the sequel of SNK vs Capcom - Rivalry Conclusion from 2013 and have now 30 Characters and most of them are new ones that was never in Neo Geo Pocket style before and will make the heart of the fans beat faster in this Game with a original plot with nostalgic easter eggs!

 Easy to play, SvC 2 - RIVALS will give you hours of fun, alone or with friends!
